name: harvest

effect.black_white: After each turn, if the last item this Pokémon consumed was a Berry and it is not currently holding an item, it has a 50% chance of regaining that Berry, or a 100% chance during strong sunlight.
effect.black_2_white_2: After each turn, if the last item this Pokémon consumed was a Berry and it is not currently holding an item, it has a 50% chance of regaining that Berry, or a 100% chance during strong sunlight.

short_effect: Has a 50% chance of restoring a used Berry after each turn if the Pokémon has held no items in the meantime.

flavor_text.black_white: May create another Berry after one is used.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: May create another Berry after one is used.
